name: Chandrashila Summit Trek and Ganga River rafting combo
description: Satiate your adventure lust with this action packed tour. The experiences to relish in are many. Trek to the charming Deoprayag, a place where of Alkhnanda and Bhagirathi rivers beautifully converge. Sink in the sights of bountiful forests and lovely alpine meadows laced with flowers as you climb up to Chopta. From the famous Chandrashila Top, get a panoramic view of snow crusted lofty peaks. Also, camp along scenic destinations. A befitting end to the thrilling tour is white water rafting to the mystical Rishikesh.
